metadata.name: 062 SIM_Scenery
metadata.description:
Subtitle
"Land of 'Humility' that shines forever seen through the eyes of the Almighty"


-
What do you see in the eyes of those who can look down on everything?

The more you try to express humility, the further away you become from it.

What message does the purgatory scenery convey to me?

The smoke from the golden land illuminates my late vanity.


-
"SIM_Scenery" - 7 Contrary Virtues collection

1) Talisman from SIM_Purgatory : 'Humility'

The pieces in this collection serve as seven talismans for the virtues of collectors. As a result, the virtues acquired by collecting the painting live on in the collector's life.

2) All collectors in this collection will receive 
1 of 1 printing and certification.
(No additional expense)

3) As a reward for winning the raffle, one collector of this collection will receive an additional 1/1 NFT and 1/1 physical print of it.
(From the "7 SINs Indulgence" collection)
